        @RequestMapping(value="save",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String save(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                   org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes ra,
                                   @RequestParam(value="cRelativeQuantity[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] cRelativeQuantity,
                                   @RequestParam(value="cPrice[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] cPrice,
                                   @RequestParam(value="cAbsoluteQuantity[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] cAbsoluteQuantity,
                                   @RequestParam(value="sRelativeQuantity[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] sRelativeQuantity,
                                   @RequestParam(value="sPrice[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] sPrice,
                                   @RequestParam(value="sAbsoluteQuantity[]")
                                   java.lang.String[] sAbsoluteQuantity)
                      throws CreateFolderFailedException
        Processes Posted Values from Distribution-Site
        Parameters:
        model - Model injection
        ra - RedirectAttributes injection for redirecting
        cRelativeQuantity - Array for all relative Quantities of Customers
        cPrice - Array for all relative Quantities of Customers
        cAbsoluteQuantity - Array for all relative Quantities of Customers
        sRelativeQuantity - Array for all relative Quantities of Salesman
        sPrice - Array for all relative Quantities of Salesman
        sAbsoluteQuantity - Array for all relative Quantities of Salesman
        Throws:
        CreateFolderFailedException
